verbs.description: While [V: welcoming] [ARG1: President Emmanuel Macron] [ARGM-LOC: in the Oval Office] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] , [ARG0: President Donald Trump] said that if Iran resumes its nuclear program , " they will have bigger problems than they ever had before . "
